nodes.text: "Deathhawk" combat airspeeders were combat airspeeders manufactured by Barresin and used by the Imperial Army. They provided support for ground troops and were used to patrol areas of a planet's surface.

The "Deathhawk" was crewed by a pilot and co-pilot, the latter of whom controlled the airspeeder's double laser cannons which had a range of one and a half kilometers. However if necessary a single pilot could control the craft and aim the weaponry by themselves.
Imperial forces used "Deathhawk" airspeeders during their occupation of Goroth.
